title: recipes_Strip_and_Go_Naked
text:
Title: Strip and Go Naked.
.
Description: This party-sized version of the classic vodka, beer and lemonade cocktail is recommended to consume before a Nebraska football game..
.
Ingredients:.
- 30 (12 fluid ounce) cans or bottles Keystone Light beer.
- 1.75 liters vodka.
- 2 (12 ounce) cans frozen lemonade concentrate, thawed.
.
Instructions:.
- In a 4 to 5 gallon sports drink dispenser, combine the light beer, vodka and lemonade concentrate. Stir gently to disperse the lemonade. Put the lid on and serve..
.
Nutrients:.
.
Serves: 55 servings.
